text.__SUMMARY__:
Lonchocarpus santarosanus, the Chapelno Blanco, is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae.
It is found in El Salvador and Guatemala.
It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.Sources: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Lonchocarpus santarosanus". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T32511A9711437. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T32511A9711437.en. Retrieved 16 December 2017.
